titlestmt.subtitle: An Inventory of Its Records, 1856-1959 and undated, at the Southwest Collection/Special Collections Library

titlepage.titleproper: Inventory for Reynolds Land and Cattle Company Records, 1856-1959 and undated
titlepage.author: Abel Ramirez

did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.unittitle: Reynolds Land and Cattle Company Records, 1856-1959 and undated
did.abstract: Records and activities of the Reynolds Land and Cattle Company from 1856-1959.

repository.label: Repository:
repository.corpname: Southwest Collection/Special Collections Library, Texas Tech University

bioghist.head: Biographical Sketch
bioghist.p: A ranching corporation of a pioneer West Texas family dating back to the 1850s, the Reynolds Land and Cattle Company operations were conducted from Fort Worth, Texas, with properties located in Shackelford, Haskell, Borden, Scurry, Dallam, Hartley, Jeff Davis, and Culberson counties of West Texas, and leased operations in Montana, New Mexico, and Oklahoma. Cattle, sheep, horse raising, general farming, oil lease activities, and horse racing have been among the company's operations, although land acquisition and development are its primary concerns.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The collection contains correspondence, legal and financial documents, and general office files. It bulks (1919-1956) with financial documents, specifically the records of cattle sales and tallies. Of special interest are the records of companies run by the Reynolds Family such as the Cisco Oil Mill, Monroe Cattle Company, Ralls County Cattle Company, Reynolds Brothers and Conrad, and the Rock Pile Ranch.

controlaccess.head: Index Terms
controlaccess.p: The subject headings used by the Southwest Collection/Special Collections Library are derived from the Library of Congress and/or locally developed.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Reynolds Land and Cattle Company Records, 1856-1959 and undated, Southwest Collection/Special Collections Library, Texas Tech University, Lubbock, Texas
